title: when are ppl gonna stop playing too lane lee sin?!
body: i mean holy hell. i get it in ranked quite often and it NEVER EVER works. dude just ends up feeding or being utterly useless. top lane lee hasnt worked or been a thing for like 3-4 seasons now. he doesnt have an attack speed slow anymore so it just flat out doesnt work. but ppl continue to do it thinking theyll do fine with it. STOP pls. for the sake of everyone on your future teams. and the worst part about it is when ppl pick it not knowing what theyre playing into lol

replies.body: How are people supposed to know you are a challenger smurf unless you lane lee sin?
